author: Staff Reporter
text:
A three-member gang allegedly cheated a woman to the tune of Rs.20 lakh.

In a petition submitted to Superintendent of Police A. Saravanan, Vijaya of Indira Nagar in Palani stated that Niyamath Ali, Ramakrishnan of Karur and Manickam of Dindigul had promised to lease a petrol bunk at Oddanchatram and received cash Rs.20 lakh from her in 2012. But they failed to do so. Several complaints were given to the Oddanchatram police but no action had been taken so far by them, she said in the petition.

Mr. Saravanan ordered an investigation.
title: SP orders investigation
